argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatrhmval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatrhmval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatrhmval.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatrhmval.t | |- .* = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatrhmval.f | |- F = ( x e. K |-> ( x .* .1. ) ) |
| 6 |  | scmatrhmval.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 |  | scmatghm.s | |- S = ( A |`s C ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_scmatrhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatf1o | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -1-1-onto-> C ) |
| 11 | 2, 6, 7 | #P_scmatstrbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` S ) = C ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` S ) = C ) |
| 13 |  | #P_f1oeq3 | |- ( ( Base ` S ) = C -> ( F : K -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) <-> F : K -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( F : K -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) <-> F : K -1-1-onto-> C ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F : K -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 19 | 2, 17, 1, 18, 6 | #P_scmatsrng | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> C e. ( SubRing ` A ) ) |
| 20 | 7 | #P_subrgring | |- ( C e. ( SubRing ` A ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. Ring ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 24 | 1, 23 | #P_isrim | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. Ring ) -> ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : K -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 16, 22, 24 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) /\ F : K -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 9, 15, 25 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ N =/= (/) /\ R e. Ring ) -> F e. ( R RingIso S ) ) |
